definitions.definition: A hanging down of the head ; a drooping posture ; a limp appearance
examples: He sat with an unenthusiastic slouch .

definitions.definition: Any depression or hanging down , as of a hat brim.
examples: The plant hung in a permanent slouch .

definitions.definition: Someone who is slow to act.

main_definition: A hanging down of the head ; a drooping posture ; a limp appearance
secondary_definitions: Any depression or hanging down , as of a hat brim.
Someone who is slow to act.
( dated ) An awkward, heavy, clownish fellow.
